mapper.insert: insert into member (login_id, login_pwd, last_name, first_name, birth, email, zipcode, main_address, sub_address,salt) values (#{loginId}, #{loginPwd}, #{lastName}, #{firstName}, #{birth}, #{email}, #{zipcode}, #{mainAddress}, #{subAddress}, #{salt})
